body: Agree with that honorable gentleman. And EO's great doujin series, 世界樹のあのね, is missing chaps, as well.

I know the comment warning says "if you ask for translations, you will die", but honestly when so much of the Etrian Odyssey doujin on this site is rape and this is one of the few good-quality ones that isn't rape, I think it's about time this had a translation.
Although, I'm sure someone can point out to me a million other series that get the same short end of the stick.
